content: Vendored source of the Ratatui terminal UI library (Rust workspace)
Rust crate with main() providing TUI dashboard; contains src/ui/ (widgets) and src/services/ (data fetchers)
Widgets: agent_list, orchestrator_panel, log_viewer, metrics, help_overlay
Data adapters: agents (discover .a2a), orchestrator queue, logs, memory metrics, semgrep alerts
JavaScript helper to interact with MCP memory server
Filesystem-based Agent-to-Agent protocol folders: discovery, messages, status, orchestrator
Agent & orchestrator template JS files for quick bootstrapping
Automation scripts: setup-env.sh, dashboard.sh, install-dashboard.sh, local-snapshot.sh, semgrep scanner
High-level explainer of the repository and its components
